comments:
Build 20020321

I was launching a runtime workspace in a J9 1.5 VM.  The VM failed to launch 
because of an incompatible class library.  An error dialog appeared indicating 
that an unhandled exception had occurred.

Presumably the error should be handled more gracefully.

The exception and stack trace is listed below.  The console output is below 
that.

------ Exception ------

<VM waiting for proxy on port=6072>
<proxy connected from localhost>
Incompatible class library.
<warning: unable to load j9max15 (JVM_OnLoad failed)>
Internal VM error: Failed to create Java VM

Note: the incompatible class library error occurred because I had set the 
JAVA_HOME environment variable to point at my Hursely JDK install.
It's not reliably repeatable.  I believe that it's sensitive to timing.

This happened to me again in the M5 build.
